div.h2: NHS Data Model and Dictionary Person Stated Gender Code

div.p: The gender of a Person. Person Stated Gender Code is self declared or inferred by observation for those unable to declare their Person Stated Gender.

name.value: NHS Data Model and Dictionary Person Stated Gender Code

description.value: The gender of a Person. Person Stated Gender Code is self declared or inferred by observation for those unable to declare their Person Stated Gender.
